verses.verse: And there was <S%G1325>given<s%> me a <S%G2563>reed<s%> <S%G3664>like<s%> to a <S%G4464>rod:<s%> and the <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2476>stood,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1453>Rise,<s%> and <S%G3354>measure<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> and them that <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1722>therein.<s%> <S%G846><s%>

But the <S%G833>court<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1855>without<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> <S%G1544>leave<s%> out, and <S%G3354>measure<s%> it not; for it is <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles:<s%> and the <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> shall they <S%G3961>tread<s%> under foot <S%G5062>forty<s%> and <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3376>months.<s%>

And I will <S%G1325>give<s%> power to my <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses,<s%> and they shall <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G1250>two<s%> <S%G1250>hundred<s%> and three <S%G1835>score<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G4016>clothed<s%> in <S%G4526>sackcloth.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> are the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1636>olive<s%> trees, and the <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3087>candlesticks<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> them, <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> out of their <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> and <S%G2719>devours<s%> their <S%G2190>enemies:<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G91>hurt<s%> them, he <S%G1163>must<s%> in <S%G3779>this<s%> <S%G3779>manner<s%> be <S%G615>killed.<s%>

<S%G3778>These<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2808>shut<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> that it <S%G1026>rain<s%> <S%G5205><s%> not in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of their <S%G4394>prophecy:<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G5204>waters<s%> to <S%G4762>turn<s%> them to <S%G129>blood,<s%> and to <S%G3960>smite<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> as <S%G3740>often<s%> as they <S%G2309>will.<s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> they shall have <S%G5055>finished<s%> their <S%G3141>testimony,<s%> the <S%G2342>beast<s%> that <S%G305>ascends<s%> out of the <S%G12>bottomless<s%> pit shall <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> them, and shall <S%G3528>overcome<s%> them, and <S%G615>kill<s%> them.

And their <S%G4430>dead<s%> <S%G4430>bodies<s%> shall lie in the <S%G4113>street<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G4153>spiritually<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> and <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> was <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

And they of the <S%G2992>people<s%> and <S%G5443>kindreds<s%> and <S%G1100>tongues<s%> and <S%G1484>nations<s%> shall <S%G991>see<s%> their <S%G4430>dead<s%> <S%G4430>bodies<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and an <S%G2255>half,<s%> and shall not <S%G863>suffer<s%> their <S%G4430>dead<s%> <S%G4430>bodies<s%> to be <S%G5087>put<s%> in <S%G3418>graves.<s%>

And they that <S%G2730>dwell<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G5463>rejoice<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> them, and <S%G2165>make<s%> <S%G2165>merry,<s%> and shall <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G1435>gifts<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%> <S%G928>tormented<s%> them that <S%G2730>dwelled<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and an <S%G2255>half<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> them, and they <S%G2476>stood<s%> on their <S%G4228>feet;<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> on them which <S%G2334>saw<s%> them.

And they <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> from <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G305>Come<s%> up <S%G5602>here.<s%> And they <S%G305>ascended<s%> up to <S%G3772>heaven<s%> in a <S%G3507>cloud;<s%> and their <S%G2190>enemies<s%> <S%G2334>beheld<s%> them.

And the <S%G1565>same<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> was there a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> and the <S%G1182>tenth<s%> part of the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4098>fell,<s%> and in the <S%G4578>earthquake<s%> were <S%G615>slain<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5505>thousand:<s%> and the <S%G3062>remnant<s%> were <S%G1719>affrighted,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> to the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven.<s%>

And the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G4537>sounded;<s%> and there were <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voices<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> The <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> are <S%G1096>become<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and of his <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and he shall <S%G936>reign<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> their <S%G2362>seats,<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> on their <S%G4383>faces,<s%> and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> We give you <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> O <S%G2962>LORD<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>are,<s%> and <S%G2258>were,<s%> and are to <S%G2064>come;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G2983>taken<s%> to you your <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G1411>power,<s%> and have <S%G936>reigned.<s%>

And the <S%G1484>nations<s%> were <S%G3710>angry,<s%> and your <S%G3709>wrath<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> and the <S%G2540>time<s%> of the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> that they should be <S%G2919>judged,<s%> and that you should <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> to your <S%G1401>servants<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and to the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and them that <S%G5399>fear<s%> your <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G3398>small<s%> and <S%G3173>great;<s%> and should <S%G1311>destroy<s%> them which <S%G1311>destroy<s%> the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G455>opened<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and there was <S%G3700>seen<s%> in his <S%G3485>temple<s%> the <S%G2787>ark<s%> of his <S%G1242>testament:<s%> and there were <S%G796>lightning,<s%> and <S%G5456>voices,<s%> and <S%G1027>thunder,<s%> and an <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> and <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5464>hail.<s%>
